Name: The Help Desk
About the game: RULES Fix problems in time; Random Problems by Levels; Configuration issues are simple; Swap problems are complex; One computer at a time; User chases you and drains your energy; No power? One less life; No time? One less life; No lives? Go back to the beginning of the game; 5 pink disks equal life; 1 green disk equal to 15 seconds; Did you spend a lot? Wait to load everything; CONTROL Use arrow keys to move; Use 'SHIFT' to run; Use 'C' to move the camera; Use 'ENTER' or 'SPACE' for any action; GAMEPLAY Enemies chase at different speeds; The game has 20 levels; Difficulty is defined by luck;
